metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5207 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Firejail before 0.9.44.4, when running a bandwidth command, allows local users to gain root privileges via the --shell argument.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5207` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firejail - 0.9.44.8-1
firejail-profiles - 0.9.44.8-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firejail package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.44.8-1').
